ResearchProjectDef.label: We are Borg
ResearchProjectDef.description: These projects involve direct development of the Borg as a playable race. Feedback, suggestions, and help are always appreciated!

ResearchProjectDef.label: Borg Queen
ResearchProjectDef.description: I want this to be cool. I can think of a number of different mechanics to use with her. I just need it to be worthy.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Nanoprobes
ResearchProjectDef.description: Nanoprobes will be invisible workers that perform tasks for the drones. I will connect them to the queen. They will be the self healing factor of borg.

ResearchProjectDef.label: New types of Nanite Substrate
ResearchProjectDef.description: Currently there is only one form of substrate for all activities. It functions as a universal medium for all Borg activity. I simply increased the costs of substrate in the mid and late game as you become more able to conquer enemies and make it more efficiently. Obviously, this is not the best solution. However, it is easy and allows for changes in post-production. Originally there were different types of substrate acquired from different materials. There is still potential here, but I don’t want it to suck. I decided to focus my energy on other places, as I need playtesting and feedback for this part. I am thinking about bringing in a second kind of substrate for valuable materials and spacer level tech. This would allow for late game development and may alleviate some of the issues with using one substrate.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Gear and Building Upgrades
ResearchProjectDef.description: Playtesting is time consuming and balancing literally never ends! I end up spending most of my time on the mod in the early terrestrial part of the game. I want to develop the spacer stuff to add content on the back end of the game. I am thinking about an additional spacer tier of weapons, armor, and buildings. It would require either boatloads of substrate or the new substrates or both.

ResearchProjectDef.label: You Will Be Assimilated
ResearchProjectDef.description: These projects are related to the Borg as a hostile NPC faction. I understand that most players only want to encounter Borg rather than play as them. This can be accomplished in a number of different ways. I have no experience with much of this stuff, so I often put off work on these things.

ResearchProjectDef.label: SOS2 Full Assimilation
ResearchProjectDef.description: I am working non-stop on this aspect of the game!

ResearchProjectDef.label: Joining the Collective
ResearchProjectDef.description: I want to streamline the process of transforming your rice-growing human pawn into a lethal Borg drone. Eventually you can create your own Queen and assimilate the galaxy! I just need some more ideas to make sure it doesn’t suck.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Borg-Related Events
ResearchProjectDef.description: This is a totally new frontier for me at this time. I’m not even sure what the possibilities are. I appreciate input!

ResearchProjectDef.label: Borg-Related Scenarios
ResearchProjectDef.description: Eventually I want to implement Borg as a hostile enemy in specific scenarios. This will probably be in the federation mod, however.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Enemy Borg Cubes
ResearchProjectDef.description: I am currently looking at the SOS2 creation kit mod. I need it to use Borg parts on the AI ship, and I need the AI to spawn actual Borg to defend the ship from boarders.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Borg Boarding Parties
ResearchProjectDef.description: I would use a different mechanic for ship battles against Borg AI. They would use transporters to instantly transmit to the player ship when the shields go down. Hostile Borg would assimilate your crew members and deconstruct your buildings.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Borg-Playter Start Scenarios
ResearchProjectDef.description: Currently I have both a space start and a citadel scenario start for Borg. I want to maximize this aspect of the game as a way to deliver bite-sized content.

ResearchProjectDef.label: RimTrek: Alpha Empires
ResearchProjectDef.description: My next major release will be Alpha Empires. This mod will feature a number of familiar playable races from the alpha quadrant. I am using these races as test dummies for cultural need mechanics that I want to implement.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Alpha Empires: Klingons
ResearchProjectDef.description: The Klingons will come first. They will feature a distinctive look, a weapon, armor, and a food. More importantly, Klingons will have a special honor cultural need mechanic that should change the game experience.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Alpha Empires: Orions
ResearchProjectDef.description: The Orions are a lesser known faction that I am really excited about. They will bring a weapon and armor as well as multiple mechanics. Orions will be sexually dimorphic, and their cultural needs will be assymetrical. They will have a hormonal cultural need that forces them to be around the opposite sex Orions.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Alpha Empires: Other Races (in the short term)
ResearchProjectDef.description: I will also be releasing expansions for Alpha Empires to cover Cardassians and Romulans. I already have the idea for the cultural needs for both. Before I do these I will first do some Federation stuff, however.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Alpha Empires: Other Races (in the long term)
ResearchProjectDef.description: I have ideas for other races as well, but these will have to wait. I want to do a Terran Empire faction, but I don't have any ideas worthy of them yet. I really want to do a RJW compatible hospitality-style mod with the Ferengi! I'm going to put it on a space station!!!

ResearchProjectDef.label: Rim Trek: Starfleet Prime
ResearchProjectDef.description: A proper Rim Trek overhaul is an ambitious task. I will need to release three parts of one mod to cover different aspects of the federation.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Rim Trek: Starfleet Tech
ResearchProjectDef.description: I need to do a technology overhaul for the Federation. I can compile things from other mods. I will also reimagine some Star Trek tech to make it an interesting game mechanic.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Rim Trek: Core
ResearchProjectDef.description: The core mod will be a Federation-centered overhaul of the scenarios, quests, incidents, stats, mental states, and economy of the galaxy.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Star Trek: Citizens of the Federation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Alien races are easy to do. I will need to cover at least a few important Federation races.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Federation Technology: Gear
ResearchProjectDef.description: I will release a bunch of apparel and weapons for the Federation. This is easy and will probably be released with a more interesting tech like transporters or replicators.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Federation Technology: Transporters
ResearchProjectDef.description: Transporters are such a huge deal from a basic game economy standpoint. I want them to look and feel good while also making them interesting in some way. This may be the first release for the technology mod.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Federation Technology:Replicators
ResearchProjectDef.description: This is such a huge and important technology. I really don't want it to be lame. I may wait until I have done something with power before I do the replicators.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Federation Technology:More Tech (Short term)
ResearchProjectDef.description: A number of little things are not difficult but are still low priority. I want to add some games, a SRTS, stun settings on phasers, and more spaceship stuff.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Federation Technology:More Tech (Long term)
ResearchProjectDef.description: Some tech things are really cool but really hard. I want to do a holodeck, but i don't want it to suck. I also want to do robots, androids, cyborgs, and holographs, but I have to think more about the implementation.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Federation Citizens:Vulcans
ResearchProjectDef.description: The first federation race would have to be Vulcans. There is a significant amount of lore about them to draw from when designing interesting mechanics for them.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Federation Citizens:Andorians and Tellarites
ResearchProjectDef.description: The Andorians and Tellarites will round out our Federation. They will have cultural needs that set them into clashes with the diverse crew.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Federation Citizens:More Races
ResearchProjectDef.description: Trill, Betazoids, and Bajorans are all Federation races that I think could have interesting mechanics. They would be far down the line, however.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Federation Core:Dilithium Power Overhaul
ResearchProjectDef.description: I need a power overhaul with dilithium at it's core. I have a number of ideas on how to implement this.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Federation Core:Fauna
ResearchProjectDef.description: I will piggyback some animals and plants from lore into the universe.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Federation Core:Scenarios and Quests
ResearchProjectDef.description: I consider scenario starts to be very important for delivering a unique game experience. I want to include hostile fortress and space starts for all of my races. I also want to use scenarios and quests to deliver starship experiences.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Federation Core:Mental States and Incidents
ResearchProjectDef.description: Nothing is more Star Trek than special events and mental breaks. I want to do things here!

ResearchProjectDef.label: Rim Trek: The Dominion Invasion
ResearchProjectDef.description: Eventually I would want to do a major expansion event with the Dominion. They could have quests and incidents affecting other factions.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Dominion: Jem'Hadar
ResearchProjectDef.description: These are the coolest thing about the Dominion. I would include pawn death as an important part of the play cycle. They would also be raised in vats and addicted to ketracil white.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Dominion: Founders and Vorta
ResearchProjectDef.description: I have a few ideas about cultural needs and mechanisms for a changeling race. The Vorta are kind of extra.
